author: Vijay Kolinjivadi
title: The coronavirus outbreak is part of the climate change emergency
description: Therefore, climate action should be central to our response to the COVID-19 pandemic.
content: The speed and scope of the coronavirus outbreak have taken world governments by surprise and left the stock market reeling. Since the virus first appeared in China's Hubei province, it has infected over 700,000 people and killed more than 33,000 across the wo… [+10134 chars]
